audioText: Cette nouvelle technologie permettra aux entreprises de réduire leurs coûts énergétiques tout en améliorant leur efficacité opérationnelle.
question: What will this new technology allow companies to do?
options: Reduce energy costs while improving operational efficiency
Increase their market share through aggressive marketing
Replace all human workers with automated systems
explanation: The text states 'Cette nouvelle technologie permettra aux entreprises de réduire leurs coûts énergétiques tout en améliorant leur efficacité opérationnelle' - This new technology will allow companies to reduce their energy costs while improving their operational efficiency. 'Permettra' is the future form of 'permettre' (to allow).
